Layouts Interface¶

class epyk.interfaces.components.CompLayouts.Layouts(context)¶
col(htmlObjs=None, position='middle', width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', align=None, helper=None, profile=None)¶

Python wrapper for a column of HTML elements from Bootstrap

This component is a container and it is used to display multiple Ares components in column. You can first add a component in the data list then add the + operator to add more.

rptObj.ui.layouts.col([

rptObj.ui.text(“test C”), rptObj.ui.text(“test D”),

])

https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.0/layout/grid/ https://www.alsacreations.com/tuto/lire/1493-css3-flexbox-layout-module.html

Parameters

  • htmlObjs –

  • position –

  • width –

  • height –

  • align –

  • helper –

  • profile –

grid(rows=None, width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', align=None, helper=None, profile=None)¶

Python wrapper to the HTML Bootstrap Grid

gr = rptObj.ui.layouts.grid() gr += [rptObj.ui.text(“test %s” % i) for i in range(5)]

https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.0/layout/grid/

Parameters

  • rows –

  • width –

  • height –

  • align –

  • helper –

  • profile –

hr(count=1, color=None, background_color=None, height=None, 'px', align=None, profile=None)¶

Wrapper around the HT html tag.

The <hr> tag defines a thematic break in an HTML page (e.g. a shift of topic).

rptObj.ui.layouts.hr(10)

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_hr.asp

Parameters

  • count – The number of HR tag to be added

  • color – Optional. The color code for the font

  • background_color – Optional. The component background color

  • height – Optional. A tuple with the integer for the component height and its unit

  • align – Optional. The content position. Values (left, right, center). Default center

  • profile – Optional. A flag to set the component performance storage

icons(icon_names=None, width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', htmlCode=None, helper=None, profile=None)¶

menu = rptObj.ui.layouts.icons([“fas fa-bell”, “fas fa-calendar-check”]) menu.icon.click([menu.icon.dom.css({“color”: ‘red’})]) menu[0].click([menu[0].dom.css({“color”: ‘red’})])

new_line(count=1, profile=None)¶

Wrapper around the Br html tag.

The <br> tag inserts a single line break.

rptObj.ui.layouts.new_line(10)

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_br.asp

Parameters

  • count – Optional, The number of empty line to put. Default 1

  • profile – Optional, Activate the profiler

row(htmlObjs=None, position='middle', width=100, '%', height=None, 'px', align=None, helper=None, profile=None)¶

Python wrapper for a column of HTML elements from Bootstrap

This component is a container and it is used to display multiple Ares components in column. You can first add a component in the data list then add the + operator to add more.

row = rptObj.ui.layouts.row() row += rptObj.ui.layouts.col([

rptObj.ui.text(“test A”), rptObj.ui.text(“test B”),

])

https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.0/layout/grid/ https://www.alsacreations.com/tuto/lire/1493-css3-flexbox-layout-module.html

Parameters

  • htmlObjs –

  • position –

  • width –

  • height –

  • align –

  • helper –

  • profile –
